name: The longbow, 'Quarter of Midnight' (2h)
data: It has magnificent weapon class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
The bow loads and fires quickly.
The bow is easy to fire and less tiring to use.
The size of the bow makes it unusable by the weak.
